original_text: Remember them that are in bonds, as bound with them; and them which suffer adversity, as being yourselves also in the body.
korean_text: 너희도 함께 갇힌 것 같이 갇힌 자를 생각하고 너희도 몸을 가졌은즉 학대 받는 자를 생각하라

sentences.original_text: Remember them that are in bonds

sentences.korean_translation: 마치 자신도 그들과 함께 결박당한 것처럼

sentences.original_text: as being yourselves also in the body
sentences.korean_translation: 마치 자신들도 육체 안에 있는 것처럼
